name: lux (Elia Perantoni)
description:
This is my sumbission for the 60# tri jam.

Gameplay

Get to the crystal.
You can toggle lights on and off.
When lights are off, you'll be able to see platforms that light up in the dark.

Controls

WASD to move.
SPACE to jump.
E to toggle lights on and off.

Feedback

This was my first game jam ever and it was
definitely more fun that I expected!

I used the godot engine (source code).

I only managed to make 4 levels in the 30 minutes I had left and not even a proper end screen XD instead you go back to the first level :(.

I had a little bit of trouble getting the player movements right and it took me some time figuring out the pros and cons of the RigidBody2D and KinematicBody2D components.

I'm quite fond of the art! I'm surprised it turned out so well.

Definitely a fun experience, will be doing again.
